item.title: CVE-2024-39633|2024-08-01T20:34:56.247Z -- ideabox -- powerpack%20for%20beaver%20builder
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in IdeaBox PowerPack for Beaver Builder allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects PowerPack for Beaver Builder: from n/a through 2.33.0.
